quote_first: “Yes.” Perena’s firm tone brooked no argument. “It exploded at
quote_last: . You would have entered at 11:02, so that by then you would have been exactly midway between the Gates.”
title: The Shadow and Night
author: Chris Walley

quote_last: by the ship’s clock the Adventurer gave a prolonged screech and, moorings cast off, edged her way out of the basin and dipped her nose in the laughing waters of the bay, embarked at last on a voyage that was destined to fully vindicate her new name.
title: The Adventure Club Afloat
author: Ralph Henry Barbour
